from GoRogue.map.dungeon.director import DungeonDirector
from GoRogue.map.tile import Floor, Wall, Door

def visualize_dungeon(tiles, title):
    print(f''\n=== {title} ==='')
    height, width = tiles.shape
    for y in range(min(20, height)):  # æœ€åˆã®20è¡Œã®ã¿è¡¨ç¤º
        line = ''''
        for x in range(min(60, width)):  # æœ€åˆã®60åˆ—ã®ã¿è¡¨ç¤º
            tile = tiles[y, x]
            if isinstance(tile, Floor):
                line += ''.''
            elif isinstance(tile, Wall):
                line += ''#''
            elif isinstance(tile, Door):
                line += ''+''
            else:
                line += ''?''
        print(line)
